example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نأسف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC اكثر)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN اسرا) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (NP-SBJ (NP (PRON_3MP هم)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (PP-PRD (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ابناء) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الكويت)))) (CONJ و) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اخوان) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العرب))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: because our prisoners are from Kuwait and our Arab brothers

example.arg: لأن أسرانا هم من أبناء الكويت و من أخواننا العرب
